com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list
Class DataSetManipulator

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list.DataSetManipulator

public class DataSetManipulator
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a bunch of helper methods to make working with lists easier from a custom tag POV.

Constructor Detail

DataSetManipulator

public DataSetManipulator(int pageSizeIn,
                          java.util.List datasetIn,
                          HttpServletRequest requestIn,
                          java.lang.String listNameIn,
                          boolean parentIsElement,
                          boolean doSearchParent,
                          boolean doSearchChild)
Constructor

Parameters:
pageSizeIn - page size of the list
datasetIn - dataset to be displayed
requestIn - HttpServletRequest of the caller
listNameIn - name of the list
parentIsElement - true of the parent value in the list should be considered as an element this is useful for tree like data
doSearchParent - true if we want to search the parent value in the list when filtering.
doSearchChild - true if we want to search the child value in the list when filtering.
